title: Jimi Hendrix-The Last Cry of Love (Isle of Fehmarn, Germany-Sept
description:
Jimi Hendrix

"The Last Cry of Love"
(Collector's discs, JPIO-II 023-026, July 2003, 4CDR)

"Love and Peace Festival"
Isle of Fehmarn, Germany
September 6th, 1970

-Compilation of all circulating audio 
(discs 1, 2 & 3) & video (disc 4) recordings 
from the Love and Peace Festival, Insel 
Fehmarn, Germany, September 6th, 1970.

-Artwork included (original and corrected one)

Track info:
-----------------------------------------------
Disc 1: 
Love and Peace Festival
Insel Fehmarn 
6/IX/1970, 1st source, "Stage Tape" 
Almost complete show ***
(***part of "Hey Joe" & The beginning of "Purple Haze" (107) are missing)

-Audience recording - low generation
 (lifted from ATM 065 "Boo in Key")
--------------------------------------------------
Disc 2: 
Love and Peace Festival
Insel Fehmarn 
6/IX/1970, 2nd source, "Windy Tape" 
Complete show **
(** some tune-ups & audience noises are edited out) 

-Audience recording - low generation
--------------------------------------------------
Disc 3: 
Love and Peace Festival
Insel Fehmarn 
6/IX/1970: 3rd source 

-Audience recording - 2nd generation 
 (lifted from ATM 128-129 "Germany '70") 

+ filler: 
Ronnie Scott's Club
London, U.K. 
17/IX/1970 

Jam with Eric Burdon & War:
"Mother Earth" * 
"Tobacco Road" * 
(* "In from the Storm" site claims that these two 
     tracks have ben taken from the tape without 
     fade-ins or fade-outs. However, "Mother Earth" 
     starts with fade-in and "Tobacco Road" ends 
     with fade-out ?!).

-Audience recording - Low generation
---------------------------------------------------
Disc 4: 
Love and Peace Festival
Isle Of Fehmarn, Germany
6/IX/1970

1. German TV Documentary: 
   "Zeichen der Zeit: Das Pop-grusical - Beobachtungen auf der Insel Fehmarn" 

2. Silent 8mm footage with Dubbed Sound: 
   "Freedom" (27i)
